list.descOS: Dual Mode - Android 9.0 and Function X

main.title1: Blok On Blok (BOB) – Innovation From Within
main.desc1: BOB powered by the Function X decentralized protocol is the world’s first true blockchain phone. It enables you to take full control over your data and reclaim your data privacy. It was also recently recognized as a CES 2020 Innovation Award Honoree. Every order of BOB will come in a MOD Assembly Kit for you to build your personalized blockchain phone.

form.terms: I am aware that the shipping cost, tax and custom fees are not included in this current order and I agree to pay them once my order is ready to be delivered.

orderConfirm.ps: *Shipping cost is not included. A confirmation email with your order number will be sent to you upon payment. You will be required to provide your shipping address and pay for the shipping fee once your order is ready. Estimated delivery will be in Q1 2020.

confirm.title: Payment successful
confirm.desc: A confirmation email has been sent to you. Please check the order details in your mailbox.
